item.title: Tech and Teaching
item.description: Remember that CPD day, the one where the member of SLT had chosen to link a YouTube video in the PPT? Remember when the URL was clicked. Remember how, because it was in presentation mode the browser of the day (it was IE, letâ€™s be real) played the video behind the Presentation? I do. I do because said member of staff was then at a loss for several minutes, for me it was an epoch, as to why there was sound but no video.
